name: Adjustable Wrench
description: A sturdy tool for zero-G repairs.

description: An electric screwdriver and bit set. Suitable for most small fasteners found on ship access panels.

name: Laser Solderer
description: A specialist tool for fast and reliable electrical repair.

name: Socket Set
description: A small case of common sized sockets, ratchets and adapters for medium sized fasteners.

name: Scan Tool
description: A handheld scanner for diagnostics
examine_text: A comprehensive tablet based scan tool. Incorporating bi-directional diagnostic logic, oscilloscope, and thermal imaging with augmented reality overlays. Upgradable with additional ship systems schematics and manuals

description: Small gauge electrical wire.
examine_text: 5 meters of small gauge insulated wire.

name: Optical Wire
description: Hybrid optical wire
examine_text: 2 meters of high quality jacketed optical wire.

name: Large Storage Cabinet

name: Large Storage Cabinet
description: A full-height storage cabinet with multiple drawers and compartments.
examine_text: Heavy-duty construction with reinforced doors and adjustable shelving.
open_description: The double doors part with a soft hiss, exposing deep shelves and pull-out drawers.

name: EVA Equipment Locker
description: Dedicated storage for extravehicular activity gear.

name: Tool Storage Cabinet
description: A professional-grade cabinet for organising hand tools.

open_description: Drawers slide out smoothly on ball-bearing runners, displaying precision-cut foam inserts.
